sentences.sContent: I’ve been so miserable since Pat left me.
sentences.sCn: 自从帕特离我而去后，我十分痛苦。

sentences.sContent: I spent the weekend feeling miserable .
sentences.sCn: 我那个周末心情很糟糕。

sentences.sContent: I spent a miserable weekend alone at home.
sentences.sCn: 我独自一人在家度过了一个惨兮兮的周末。

sentences.sContent: ...Where once retirement was seen as a brief reward after a long struggle through some miserable job...

remMethod.val: 来自misery(n. 痛苦)， mis(坏) ＋ ery(表状态) → 坏事 → 痛苦的

words.tran: 贫困地；可悲地；糟糕地；非常不幸地

trans.tranOther: extremely unhappy, for example because you feel lonely, cold, or badly treated
